segments.text: Can you put me through to Mr . Lining ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , speaking . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to let you know that you are selected to fill the position of Project Manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am happy to hear that and I'll accept that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , are you married ?
segments.speaker: S1
